snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin has, at least for now, made Russia indispensable in containing the conflict in Syria.
abstract: Pres Vladimir V Putin has, at least for now, made Russia indispensable in containing conflict in Syria; is offering potential, if still highly uncertain, alternative to what he has vocally criticized as America’s militarism and reasserted Russian interests in region where it had been marginalized since collapse of Soviet Union.

byline.contributor: Andrew Roth contributed reporting from Moscow, and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin has, at least for now, made Russia indispensable in containing the conflict in Syria.

headline.main: As Obama Pauses Action, Putin Takes Center Stage
headline.print_headline:
As Obama Pauses Action,
Putin Takes Center Stage
